lead_paragraph: Taylor Hall, Pavel Zacha and John Moore scored in the second period and the New Jersey Devils held on to beat the New York Rangers 5-4 in exhibition play Saturday night.

headline.main: Hall, Zacha, Moore Score in 2nd to Help Devils Beat Rangers
headline.print_headline: Hall, Zacha, Moore Score in 2nd to Help Devils Beat Rangers

snippet: Taylor Hall, Pavel Zacha and John Moore scored in the second period and the New Jersey Devils held on to beat the New York Rangers 5-4 in exhibition play Saturday night....
